q: Simon Cowell , who was on The Today Show to talk about his upcoming version of American X Factor, was guarded about who the judges will be. ''They will be cute,'' he said. But the male judges will not be as good looking as me. Later in the interview multi-millionaire Simon Cowell defended the promotion of child stars on X Factor. ''In the final you could have a 14-year-old versus a 40-year-old,'' said Simon Cowell . When

In Germany earlier this week, Eric Schmidt told a group of reporters at the Digital-Life-Design conference that he is committed to doing what he currently doing as long as it is exciting. He also said that as executive chairman, he will be dealing a lot with regulators and other government officials, as Google Inc. 's sprawling presence continues to capture more attention from governments around the world. Eric Schmidt :
